meanings.definition: To surpass in number of rebounds.
meanings.sent1: The basketball team outrebounded their opponents by grabbing more rebounds.
meanings.sent2: Our team outrebounded the other team by getting more rebounds during the game.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel outrebounded the big squirrel in collecting acorns for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The student outrebounded his classmates in solving the math problems quickly.
meanings.sent5: The cheetah outrebounded the gazelle in the race, showing incredible speed.

meanings.definition: To have more rebounds than another team or player.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team outrebounded their opponents in getting possession of the ball.
meanings.sent2: During the match, our team outrebounded the other team by securing more rebounds.
meanings.sent3: The little boy outrebounded his friends in catching the most fish at the pond.
meanings.sent4: The company outrebounded its competitors in sales this quarter.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner outrebounded the others in endurance, finishing the race first.
